title.value: ChatGPT vs LLaMA: Impact, Reliability, and Challenges in Stack Overflow Discussions
title.justification: The title precisely captures the essence of the research by highlighting the comparison between ChatGPT and LLaMA on their impact and reliability in the context of Stack Overflow.
title.quote: ChatGPT vs LLaMA: Impact, Reliability, and Challenges in Stack Overflow Discussions

extractions.description: The paper investigates the potential of using Large Language Models (LLMs) such as ChatGPT and LLaMA to replace traditional web forums like Stack Overflow for answering technical questions. It evaluates the reliability of the LLM-generated answers and discusses the impact of LLMs on user engagement on Stack Overflow, identifying domains where LLMs face challenges.

type.justification: The paper conducted an empirical study analyzing user questions from Stack Overflow and using two LLMs (ChatGPT and LLaMA) to address them. Statistical and qualitative analyses were applied to evaluate the impact and reliability of the generated answers.
type.quote: We conducted an empirical study analyzing questions from Stack Overflow and using these LLMs to address them.

primary_research_field.justification: The research is centered around the use of Large Language Models, which are a key area within the field of Deep Learning.
primary_research_field.quote: With the advance of Large Language Models (LLMs), practitioners and researchers have explored their potential to perform different tasks...

sub_research_fields.justification: The study specifically deals with how LLMs, which are a sub-field of Natural Language Processing within Deep Learning, can be used to generate human-like answers to technical questions on Stack Overflow.
sub_research_fields.quote: Built on the GPT architecture, it can be used for a variety of applications... Currently, OpenAI offers different models, but in this study, we focus on ChatGPT-3.5.

name.justification: ChatGPT-3.5 was evaluated in the study to address questions on Stack Overflow and compare its responses with those generated by humans.
name.quote: This study focuses on ChatGPT 3.5... We used the GPT-3.5-turbo variant for our research, interacting with it through its API.

caracteristics.justification: ChatGPT-3.5 is a Large Language Model developed by OpenAI, trained on extensive sets of textual data to generate human-like text.
caracteristics.quote: ChatGPT: ChatGPT is a language model developed by OpenAI. It is designed to generate human-like text based on the prompts it receives.

name.justification: LLaMA-2 was evaluated alongside ChatGPT to compare their reliability and challenges in generating responses for Stack Overflow questions.
name.quote: Similar to ChatGPT, it spans various use cases, such as interacting with humans. In our study, we relied on the latest LLaMA version, i.e., LLaMA-2.

caracteristics.justification: LLaMA-2 is another Large Language Model, developed by Meta, designed for various natural language processing tasks.
caracteristics.quote: LLaMA, released by Meta AI, is a series of large language models... Similar to ChatGPT, it spans various use cases, such as interacting with humans.

name.justification: The study used a dataset of questions and answers from Stack Overflow to analyze the performance of ChatGPT and LLaMA.
name.quote: We mine questions and related information from Stack Overflow for ten months (before and after ChatGPTâ€™s release).
